name: Guide for Limax.io
description:
If you like those newly seen ‘cursor following’ games such as Slither.io, there is a new player in the arena.
Limax.io’s just gonna stuck you right in front of your monitor.

Get the most game experience by getting knowledge about the game.

We are ready to help you, as we have collected most of the things you should know about Limax.io, cheats, mods, guides and videos!
